Credit Line: Gift of Thomas Nast, Jr., Mabel Nast Crawford and Cyril Nast, 1933
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Women being admired by men within an interior. Reprint of a wood engraving originally published in Harper's Weekly, 1871.
Provenance: Donor: Thomas Nast, Jr. (American, born 1865)Donor: Mabel Nast Crawford (American, ca. 1872–1965)Donor: Cyril Nast (American, 1879–1966)
